MySQL query:

SELECT ID FROM wp_posts WHERE post_type = 'post' AND post_status = 'publish' AND post_date < curdate( ) - INTERVAL day AND post_date > curdate( ) - INTERVAL day ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: SELECT ID FROM wp_posts WHERE post_type = :param0 AND post_status = :param1 AND post_date < curdate( ) - '+day AND' post_date > curdate( ) - '+day ORDER BY' RAND() LIMIT 1 | parameters: post, publish
